name: Sand Digger
description:
This game HIGHLY inspired by Minesweeper tests your Memorization SKILLS! Dig up treasure chests to reveal bombs and dig up all sand spaces to win! BUT be careful make sure not to hit any bombs or else it will be a GAME OVER!

Controls: 

Set Difficulty: keyNumber1: easy, keyNumber2: medium, keyNumber3: hard
Start New Game/Restart Game: Space
